content.detailedDescription: I  am  describing  a  few  happenings.  as  a child  going  to  school  a  light  shone down on me  from above  a few  times one morning  even though i changed my position  on the road,  not long after,  just around the corner  a few  of  us  kids  saw  a  big  light in the sky  which  was  reported  in  the  local  newspaper  the  next  night,  the  cork  echo.  it  said  that  strang  lights  were  seen  in  the  sky  over  the  north  side  of  cork  city.  about  15  years  ago  i  saw  5  lights   about  5  miles  east  of  here,  formation  flying.  a  year  later,  or  so,  a  light  the  size  of  three  houses,  which  started  as a  pinprick  in  the  south  sky  and  flew  at  a  phenominal  pace  towards  me  and  stopped  about  30  feet  over  my  head  for  about  20  seconds  and  then  it  scrambled  and  headed  northeast.  in  1992 about  iwas  playing  swingball  with  a  friend  from  america  5  miles  east  again  at  night time  and  a  light  shone  down  on  us  for  about  2  seconds,  a  dull  light.When  i  think  back  on  all  this  i  find  it  amazing.  and  obout  11years  ago  5  small  balls  of  light  came  into  my  flat  and  flew  around  and  left  again  and  then  a  big  search light  shone  in  my  window  from  the  sky  and  i  looked out  my  window  right  away  and  there  was  not  a  soul  in  sight. my  life  was  saved  a  few  times  in  my  life.I  used to  get  blood  noses  as  a  kid  and  is  not  this  a  sign  of  alien  abduction,  according  to  one  of  the  sights.  i  filled  in  a  questionaire  one  time  and  i  answered  positive  to  most  of  the  symptoms.  you  are  free  to  send  me  an  e  mail  if  you  wish  to  shed  some  light  on  the  subject  if  you  will  pardon  the  pun.  yours  john .
content.summary: On numerous occasions in  my  life lights have appeared over my head. could you  explain

content.detailedDescription:
My daughter and i were swimming after midnight in our pool and as i floated on my back, at first i saw a regular airplane (i believe it to be one since it had green and red lights like one and flew like one) which 
was very high up and as i was watching it... what appeared to be 1 or 2 smaller bright white round lights showed up around it but i couldn't tell if they came from it or if they were way high above it or what since 
they were going so quickly. in my opinion, these lights were surely ufo related because i have never seen anything like it before. 
i called to my daughter and pointed up (not taking my eyes off of this) saying, "i wonder if the plane sees it! am i seeing what i think i'm seeing... what do you see?" she looked up and said, "it's a light doing 
figure eights zipping around real fast, oh my god...It's a ufo!." she says it was 1 light but i thought it was 2 because it looked that way to me since the light was zipping so fast. my sight is much poorer than hers, but i am positive that i saw ufo activity. 
the airplane flew off normally, but the light stayed as it was when i first saw it, making a couple zig zags at first and then several semi circular patterns in what seemed like a small span of space until it just 
disappeared. 
if you stand outside and point up into the sky and make a letter "c" (both forward and backward) with your pointer finger a few times in a row very fast... this is about the span of measurement it works out to be while looking up. that is a good example to me because i'm not good at determining these distances. 
this is the first time either of us ever saw anything "weird" like 
this. it's my estimate that the whole thing lasted about 10-20 seconds. we waited about 15 more minutes in case it came back but we didn't see anything else. i searched on my computer right away for local area sightings and hadn't seen anything. thanks for the chance to report 
it.
content.summary: Bright white round lights high up zig zags and cicular motions for 15 secs

content.detailedDescription:
On wed. aug 19th, about 9:30 at night, i was sitting outside with some friends on their deck in monument, colorado, west of the i-25 interstate. 

we were looking at the sky, saying how bright the stars were that night. 

i said,"look, there's a satellite." far above where planes fly, was a small,bright, blinking light. it was moving at a steady pace, and so high up i thought it was a satellite. 

then, it got brighter and bigger, so i said, "oh. maybe it's a plane after all. it's too bright to be a satellite." as soon as i said that, it got huge. it became this large, elliptical(like a football) light-incredibly bright and white. it stayed where that way-like a huge, bright eye looking directly at me- for several seconds. 

then, it became the size and brightness of a plane again, and seconds afterwards, a small, blinking light continuing in it's high orbit,  looking just like a satellite, until it continued out of sight.

i was amazed at what i saw, and told my friend about it, but he just laughed and said i was imaging it.

i know i didn't imagine it.  it went from being a speck of light, to this huge,bright, white light object in the sky. i have never seen anything like it before.
content.summary: A bright, white light; ellipitcal in shape-like a football. huge in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
1. i was driving from my home to church with my two kids. i had just turned northbound onto union rd. from northgate blvd. when i first saw it. it was well above the horizon to the north of me, hovering motionless. 
2. the object caught my eye because sunlight was glinting off of it.
3. i don't recall thinking it was anything...By that i mean it didn't look like anything familiar such as an airplane, bird, blimp, balloon or anything else. my only thought was "what the heck is that?"
4. the object was silvery/metallic. cigar shaped but rounded and tapered at both ends. sunny cloudless sky. the object was to my north well above the visible horizon, trees, streetlights, etc. truthfully, i can't say how far off it was. the object could have been small and very close, or huge and very far away. 
the object appeared to be hovering, motionless.
5. i was confused/curious as to what the object was. as i said, it didn't resemble
anything i could chalk it up to. i turned east onto lathrop rd. and continued viewing the object out my open left side window, still apparently hovering.
6. this is what weirded me out. it took off to the east in a blur. i mean, it went from completely motionless to moving at a rate of speed i won't even try to estimate. it didn't accelerate like anything i've ever seen. you know, something begins to move and picks up speed at a constant rate. it just took off like a bullet from a complete standstill. again, it was a blur, heading east and just disappeared in a second. i turned north into my church parking lot and looked around but saw no sign of it. the kids didn't see it. they were spaced off looking in other directions. i never spoke up to point out the object. by the time it occured to me to do so, the object was gone. the whole experience from beginning to end lasted perhaps a minute, maybe two at the most.

  what the heck was that??? i'm a commercial driver. i've spent most of my adult life outside/driving in every concievable weather condition. i'm 38 years old. i've seen odd things in the sky...Particularly at night driving through the desert. i've always chalked it up to far off aircraft, meteors, military activity, moonlight on an unusual cloud formation, etc. this was in broad daylight. i'm not crazy. i don't do drugs. i'm not a conspiracy/ufo nut. all i'm saying is i saw something utterly inexplicable. it bugs me...
content.summary: Hovering object, metallic, accelerated out of sight

content.detailedDescription: I was outside having a smoke when i glanced up and thought i saw satellite. i observed the object change direction 4 times at different speeds and at one point stop completely it then reversed course and disappeared behind my apartment building approx 2 minutes later it came back on the same trajectory but at a slower speed. the object then stopped. it accelerated at a very high speed at what appeared to be an almost vertical climb but at a slight angle.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Witnessed what i thought was a sattelite object began deviating off course accelerating and slowing and eventually stopped completely object then accelerated out of sight at an extremely high rate of speed inconsistent with known aircraft or sattelite.

content.detailedDescription: I had just stepped into my yard. looked up to the sky and saw this glowing orb approaching from the west. it made a quick left turn and headed north east at tremendous speed. it made no sound. it happened so quickly. when i tried to visually follow it, i could not for my tree blocked my view.
content.summary: Luminous orb. orange greenish glow

content.detailedDescription: At approximately 10.50pm on saturday 29th august i had just got into bed. the area i live in has no street lighting so nights are always very dark and i have yet to install curtains as i am renovating a house. i have a fantastic view across the valley and often look out before i sleep as the constellations are very clear. as i was going to bed i looked out of the window and thought it strange that a large number of stars were moving across the sky. i ran to the window and opened it to see at least 7 or 8 white/orange 'stars' following the line of the ridge know locally as east hill. the lights were moving at a reasonable speed and i watched them for at least thirty seconds or so then ran to fetch my video camera. i filmed the area as the objects moved over east hill and out of sight to the north. the only footage i have is of a very prominent background star in the area which would be of little use i am sure. although there is air traffic in the area, these were clearly not planes. they appeared to fly together although no symmetry was observed. the objects remained close at all times. there was no noise i could make out. i am very familiar with the night sky in this area and this was at the very least highly unusual. i have never experienced anything like this before and have spent long nights in the summer with the children watching shooting stars and meteor showers so we know the difference. these were low level objects which did not conform to any view i would associate normally with the night sky. i also ran outside after seeing the objects and took some footage north just to see if anything could be captured but nothing has appeared.
content.summary: A 'fleet'of lights passing at low altitude over surrounding hills (sidbury, devon)

content.detailedDescription: Hi , just thought i would send you this photo i took whist on holliday in north wales. maybe its nothing but it spooks me. i was taking a longtime exposure of the stars moving accross the sky at haven holliday camp in pwellheli north wales and was baffled when the photo showed a disc like object in the sky. there is some camera flare from a street light at the edge of the photo but i cant see how that could account for the disc like object. please take time to look and let me know what you think.
content.summary: Disc shaped, green

content.detailedDescription:
While watching a military documentary on netflix, i observed an object fly near an apache helicopter twice during the same segment. the documentary was entitled "future weapons season 1 episode 5. the place, date and time of the documentary is unknown. the object can be seen at times 27:03 and 27:47 min/secs into the 42 minute episode. attached are two digital camera shots of the computer screen of the events as depicted. the documentary is of course copyrighted and the two screen shots are only submitted as visual evidence to pique mufon's possible interest in investigating the above named video further. this is not the first time thst unusual objects have been captured by professional photographers and moviemakers. the fact that these types of events are able to pass through undetected, the video editing process, is a boon to the study of the ufo phenomenom.

thank you mufon for your good work
content.summary: Ufo flys by apache helicopter

content.detailedDescription: I looked into the night sky and observed what i thought to be a satelite moving quickly through the night sky, as satelites do. but then i noticed another object moving, hundreds of miles from the first object, both seemed to be mirroring one another, moving at the same speed and keeping a precise distance from each other. that in itself was strange, but when they both moved in a jagged, off balanced manner, both in complete and utter sinc with one another, that was really weird. it was as though both objects decided to trip at the same time and in the same manner with precisely the same off balanceness, even though they were hundreds of miles a part. they were two objects because the stars could be seen between them. i watched them both until they were out of site beyond the tree line.
content.summary: Two moving objects in night sky

content.detailedDescription: I heard a noise out side and went out to investigate and i leaned against my truck stareing into the back yard and thats when the object came out from above the tree line it was moveing real slow i ran into the house and called my wife and ran into the back yard and watched it for about 2 minutes then i ran into the house to get camera came out and i got a very short viedo of it when i then ran back out to the front yard to get my other camera to get more viedo by that time it dissapeared behind the trees. i just was watching ufo viedos on the internet before all this happen and the viedo was a ufo that was filmed in portland oregon amagine that wow that was wierd huh.Witnessed by me my wife and my son.
content.summary: It was a glowing reddish silent slow moveing just abovethe tree line no more than 1/4 mile away

content.detailedDescription: I was on the steps at my friends basement i was looking up at the stars and for some reason it stood out it caught my eye in a very astonishing way i new right of the bat it didnt belong there because it was to big. like i said it was about the size of a fridgerator and i was dam nere under neith it well about 30 feet from it i started comparing it to the other transisters and cable boxs to refrance it thats when i noticed that this object was hovering or ballanced itself on two teliphone lines that were about four feet from eachother it seemed to be making contact with the lines i said to my self man  what the hell is it because of its size it should be waying those lines down it didnt make a sound but it felt like an electricity was like in the air not that you could see electricity but you could feel it and it didnt feel good almost like when you turn your tv on that ringing kind of noise but amplified times ten ever body was sleeping in the whole nieghborhood and i didnt want to tell my friends or my wife or my kids i dont want them to think that im weird so i havnt told any one about this.Ill tell you how i felt about it at first shock because of its size then mezmerized then scared because how it made me feel i didnt feel good the more i stared at it the more i didnt want to look at it but because i new it was there i was intreegued buy it i never seen somthing that i didnt now what it was besides i had the feeling that it new it was being watcthed and that scared me i looked at it for about a hour  and told my self remember the little box next to it that was about a foot away from it.I didnt take a picture of it cause i was scared to and plus i was bussy trying to hide from it so i went in laid down couldnt get to sleep tried to watch tv at about four thirty am kicked my fear steped out side and it was gone the big sqaure silver cube thing that was next to the little box was gone and to my surprise i looked up and there was a huge patch in the sky that looked like the northern lights and i did manage to take three pictures of it this was in july 2009 i think the goverment nows but is not saying for the worlds safty that was a life changing experience ill always look up at the stars i am puerto rican korean and thats my testomony.
content.summary: Almost sqware silver nickal size of small fridgerator

content.detailedDescription: I was in south shererville at 9:15pm when i saw what looked like a star but something about it was different so i drove a few block while i was watching it then i noticed it was moveing, the color was a pumkin orange , it was noiseless i stopped on a side street and shut off my car and you could hear a pin drop yet no noice from this orange ball, it has no blinking light s i know it wasnt any type of aircraft ive ever seen. the object went from the east to the west and it went till i couldent seeit anymore due to tall trees.. the objet didnt stop that i seen.It went in a straight line no turning just east to west... pretty wierd..
content.summary: Orange noiseless object

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were taking pics of a shape changing "star" from the front yard of my mom's house looking west to east in yakima, wa.  this "star" stayed in the sky approx. 4 -5 hours in the same general area.  it could have been longer but i only noticed it around 11:30pm.  i took 178 pics and these two stood out the most.  it was definitley one "star" changing shapes several times and changing colors.  it would fade in and out and then brighten and dim and hover.  i got tired of watching it and finally went to bed.  pics were not altered except to crop them and zoom in.
content.summary: Took pics of shape changing "star" that changed colors from yakima, wa

content.detailedDescription: On that night, i came out side to look around before bed as i always do.  i always look at the sky for a while .  as i was looking up a brite yellow to white orb came out of nowhere right above me moving fron east to west.  the sky was crystal clear and there were no lights around, you can really see the stars from here.  there were a few very small high level clouds in the sky, i new they were high up because they seemed small compared to the stars.  by the way there is  o air traffic around here.  the orb moved in a easterly direction as i watched.  it approach one of these little clouds, past it by what looked like an inch from the ground, and the abruptly turned in a hair pin like move incapable by any aircraft, and went inside this small cloud, and was gone i watched it for a long time asttonished at what i had seen..  several months before i had seen one of the same objects shooting across the sky from se to ne, and on the forth of july 2008 saw one as well but it was huge.
content.summary: Looked up as often do and saw a ufo

content.detailedDescription:
Hydrogen + boron = fusion fuel.
hydrogen easy to get.
green leaves good source of boron.

On 8/28/09 and 8/29/09  myself and my wife saw a glowing orange ball of light almost like fire because it was emitting sparks a little bit ..Now keep in mind we live next to an airport and are use to seeing air planes..Also i was a deputy for 5 years  and my wife was a jailer so we are used to reporting things in detail..The light moved from the southwest to the north east. last night it was exactly 55 minutes after the space shuttle went off..
it emitted a steady amber glow and sometimes would get real bright and spark like fire is the best way i can describe it..Is it possible we are seeing something else like a satellite or space station? both times there was no noise at all and it kept a steady pace and then just would vanish completely..There were also a few others on the same street of mine that was watching this object in wonder.. the first night we tried to catch it on camera but of course the batteries were dead. we will try to be ready to capture it again if we can..We walk our k-9 dog at night alot so its possible we will see it again..We are both skeptics as to what this thing is..
content.summary: Orange or looked like it was fire burning

content.detailedDescription: I was attendind a high school football game in st. john indiana(lake central high school), when at half time ( 8:20pm) i went to my car in the parking lot. as i approched my car i looked up to see a light in the sky, at first i thought it may be a star. as i watched the light i ruled out that it was a star because the light was below the cloud cover. (the clouds were low approx. 3000 to 5000 feet.) as i watched the light it started to move, slowly at first left to right, right to left. soon the light was making circles not perfect circles but eratic ones. i continues to watch the light for approx. 1 minute 30 seconds then the light slowly accended into the clouds and i lost sight of it.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Blueish light flying in eratic circles, and moving from left to right before slowly disappearing into a low level cloud.

content.detailedDescription: My mom and myself were looking at a strange spinning "star" that kept changing colors.  it kept going further away and coming closer, then brightening and then dimming.  this went on for 4 plus hours starting at around 10pm.  i took several pics and then downloaded them onto my computer.  the pics were not altered in any way except to sharpen the image and crop it closer to see it better.  what do you think it could be????
content.summary: We were taking pics of a spinning and colorful "star" that kept brightening and dimming

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing on the patio smoking a pipe. i enjoyed the unusual mild night, lit with a few stars. i was facing south/southeast. venus was to the right (high in sw) and the full moon was just climbing high in the ne. 
then, out of nowhere, i saw two star-like shapes appear, as if someone would turn on two lights using a dimmer switch. 
they both had the same magnitude in brightness, but not quite as bright as venus, i'd say. 
at first i thought i'm seeing satellites, but those objects did not move at all - just sitting there like stars. 
just then i got my wife to witness this event and she too thought this was awesome (it did look really pretty as it looked like two stars underneath each other in close proximity). both those objects seemed to have the same strength in brightness. the event didn't last longer than a minute and a half, two max. we watched them slowly fade away, just like they first appeared: slowly being dimmed down until they blended in with the darkness. and i haven't seen them since. 
to give you a bit of an orientation: the constellation orion was low in the east, one could clearly see the 'belt'. if you stretch your arm to full length, make a fist and 'line it up' with the belt of orion - approximately two adult fists to the right, this was where these objects were. i also saw a plane fly passed these objects, slightly underneath from my point of view ... so, i'm almost certain the pilots must have seen them too. 
so, no satellite, no stars, no planets, it didn't move, nor did it blink or radiate - just two plain, bright white objects. they slowly faded in, hung there for not quite two minutes and then slowly faded out again. what could that have been?
content.summary: Two star-like object in the night sky

content.detailedDescription:
Date of sighting: may 24, 2009
time of sighting: 3:15 pm pdt
location of sighting: on i-82 highway near yakima, washington

note:  i did not know the accurate duration of sighting because i did not even see the ufo visually.  i noticed it when i was downloading the pics onto my computer.

description: i was randomly taking pictures over a ridge in yakima (actually just outside the city) through my sunroof (left hand on the wheel and right hand taking pics through the sunroof). i had just left my mom's to go back to seattle. in this area, there is a "military base" as you ascend i-82 that seems completely invisible. there is never any activity going to and from the freeway exit to this base - you never see people, military aircraft or any vehicles. this area is highly suspicious for ufo sightings and is considered a "hotspot". i was taking pictures of my boyfriend's white truck ahead of me (both of us drove separate to and from yakima that weekend) and for some reason, i decided to take pictures as we went over this ridge, but just past the military sign. i was not thinking of anything in particular as i had my boyfriend's son was with me in the car and we were just messing around with the camera. this ufo was not visible until after the picture was taken and i was viewing pictures later that evening.
content.summary: Taking random pics of truck in front from outside sunroof.  ufo not seen visually, only when downloaded.

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i reported a sighting in the north eastern sky over yucaipa on june 24, 2009.  since that report i have seen the same thing happen twice again.  i smoke a pipe in the evening, so i am out on my porch a few times each night between 8pm and 11pm.  three times now i have seen this small white speck that looks at first like a satellite high in the night sky that suddenly glows to a brilliant whitish blue like a helicopter spotlight then dims again and moves off away from us.  i have considered that it may be some sort of energy flash from an actual satellite when it is repositioned or something...But i'm not sure that there is such a satellite out there.  i have also considered it may be a very large solar panel that is reflecting the sun...But it is always at a different time and the last time i say it it was traveling in the opposite direction from the first time.  we don't know what it is, but it is unusual.  anyone have an idea?
content.summary: Another bright light high in the night sky...

content.detailedDescription: Driving down mountain rd towards simsbury, all area lights went out - each street light went out one after the other, extremely dim then completely out.  the traffic light went out and any homes we could see did not seem to have any lights.  the power outage startled us slightly but we drove with caution approaching the traffic light.  as we turned left onto route 185, there was suddenly a brilliant horizontal blue light across the sky as far as we could see.  though the area has many trees, the blue light was a shade like we've never seen in the sky and it seemed to span well beyond the trees, like the entire sky had changed.  the center was the brightest and deepest shade of blue and the further from the center the shade seemed to lighten but was just as bright.  the light remained brilliant in the sky for just a few seconds.  within a few short seconds of the light disappearing, all of the area lights came back on.  a few seconds after that, the sky lit up again of a strobe effect that was bright white but with many colors flashing inside it - mostly reds and blues but also green.  that lasted maybe 10 seconds and as soon as it abruptly stopped the lights all went back out again.  we speculated the possibility of weather activity or even the rare event in our area of the aurora borealis.  we pulled down a side street to pull over and watch the sky.  there were no sounds or noises, it had been raining that day and night so no fireworks events would be scheduled.  the activity seemed to be over with so we continued on our path of travel.  we were stopped for maybe 1-2 minutes.  as we came back to the main road, all the lights and traffic lights were working again.  as we continued to travel home, we noticed that there appeared to be an interesting horizon to the east.  this was approx 8:15-8:30 and after the rain the sky had been pitch black.  the moon was barely visible through the clouds so the bright horizon was definitely unusual.  sometimes it seemed to be just like a sunset and other times it was just very bright and white-ish.  the forecast had predicted thunderstorms but the steady beam of light was not lightening or anything like we've ever seen before.  after returning home, we tried to research any similar reporting or activity.  in doing so, we found a handful of very similar reports in ny and a few other states too over the last 9 months or so.  it was unlike anything either one of us have ever seen or experienced.
content.summary: Horizontal blue light and many colored flashes

content.detailedDescription: I went for a quick ride around the corner from my apartment complex and i went up this street that had a golf corse on it when i got to the last house before the golf corse a fire ball (that was as low as when u see a plane flying really low that you can see every detail of the plane) caught my attention out of the corner of my eye.. it was hovering over the house and just stayed there i was with my friend matt and he was like pull over in front off the house and lets see what it is... so i pulled over and we just sat there and watched it not move for like 2 min..Not up or down or left and right just sat there... so i said hey im gunna turn the car around and pull on the other side of the street so we can see it better... so in the time it took me to pull the car around witch was like a min tops it was all the way across the sky and now the size of a star then it just dissapered.. i know that that was it because it was a verydark nite and there were no stars in the sky that was the only thing in the sky at that time.. so dumpfounded i decieded to head back to my apartment.. when i got to the bottom of the same road i was on witch took me about 2 min after it had vanished.. therer it was again just as low in the sky just as bright this big fire ball looking thing with a red dot in the middle just right above my car and it stayed above my care for like 2 min as i drove up to my parkin spot at my complex.. me and matt quickly jumped out of the car and there it was just sitting there right above us and then it jumped to the middle of the sky in amatter of a second and then in another second jumped even further back to the size of the star again then there was a little flash and it was gone agian.. we waited out side for like 15 min waiting to see if we could see it again and nothing... it was out of this world.. i have never seen anything thing like this before.. i only wish ihad my camera!
content.summary: Low fire like circle with a red dot in the middle and stayed very still....

content.detailedDescription:
Sighting #4 may 4, 2004 8:00pm

i spotted a bright orange-red ball appearing from the northwest. it was low in the sky, tree top height to small airplane height. it seemed to fly erratically and going slowly (30mph) as it got closer. right above the corner of my street it took a right turn up my street (north). my husband and i chased it up the street just to see where it was going. it is strange but people on the street never looked up even though we were running and pointing and saying, look!  we ran 2 blocks more when it picked up speed and was gone. i think it was about the size of a volkswagen beetle.

i was going to the store just a few mins from my house. i drove down my street headed south. when reached the stop sign i noticed a red light i thought it was a plane or sumthing. i turned left still keeping my eye on it cuz i figured a plane would have flashing light so it was different looking. i couldnt tell the distance until it moved. i drove a lil futher maybe 150 yards looking back at it.  then i realized it was over the baseball field about 60 yards from the stop sign i was at. i stoped my car right away and got out. it was still hovering over the b-ball field. i listened closly i was wondering if it was a small helicopter... it made no sound at all.  the light pulsed with with no certain rythem. it also would go out completly then turn back on. i watched it hover very slowly to the left & then it started in my direction but never got closer than 100 yards maybe a little less. i could not see a shape just light. it made circular movements going back & forth. from left to right slowly. i call my mom who works for the police dept. she called a officer on duty. i drove to the high school which is by my house to get closer to the object. as i enter the parking lot it went south farther away from me. about the same distance from me sitting on the road. i knew at this point it was awear of my presence & interest. i decided to see if it was for sure so i started driving my car back & forth through the parking lot. this light followed my every move. i would stop quickly & it stoped on a dime. i would set for a second then reverse quickly then stop. it was moving exactly as i was. it would hover in one spot when i was setting still. the officer came to the school & seen it himself. hes said it was  a helicopter in stealth mode. but he & i drove towards it he took the big light on his car shining it at the object driving towards it. it was keeping distance from us. when he left being a bit sceptical he said "i dont know what it is". i stayed for a bit longer then decided to go to the store. as i drove away from the school it followed me followed me bout quarter mile. i made my way back towards my house when i turned onto pioneer lane towards the school. i could see it still over the school. i went back to the school & continued seeing if it would copy me & it did.  i was interested in see more of it. i drove to the back on the parking lot where it was really dark nothing around. i turned my car off. at this time it was about 80 yards or so south of me & about 100ft of the ground hovering in one spot. there was no sound at all, it changed it light to a soft white,yellow color not super bright. about the same strenght as the red i would say. i got out of my car turning my engine if & lights. i walked about 30 feet from my car towards it & didnt move. i was scared to go any closer. i stayed back there staring at it for another 10 mins i think. it went slowly south after that. ive seen it one more time about a month ago. also my mother & i seen a day time ufo here about a month ago.  she got a very good look at it. she called me & said look in her direction she was east of me about half mile. she desrcibed is as a boomer-rang making a loud humming sound. i looked i heard the loud humming sound it was very loud. i seen a very very flat object & it looking like it had a configuration of poles on top if it. it was strange & my mother still cant figure it out. i consider myself very rational person & my mother is also. im a facts kinda person i saying without a dout this is what happen. i would like too know if someone could help determine what it was. i stay curious about it & ivve been keeping my eye towards the sky. i could dscribe in better detail i think over the phone.
content.summary: Red pulsing light about 100ft off the ground no sound.

content.detailedDescription: i was going to the store just a few mins from my house. i drove down my street headed south. when reached the stop sign i noticed a red light i thought it was a plane or sumthing. i turned left still keeping my eye on it cuz i figured a plane would have flashing light so it was different looking. i couldnt tell the distance until it moved. i drove a lil futher maybe 150 yards looking back at it.  then i realized it was over the baseball field about 60 yards from the stop sign i was at. i stoped my car right away and got out. it was still hovering over the b-ball field. i listened closly i was wondering if it was a small helicopter... it made no sound at all.  the light pulsed with with no certain rythem. it also would go out completly then turn back on. i watched it hover very slowly to the left & then it started in my direction but never got closer than 100 yards maybe a little less. i could not see a shape just light. it made circular movements going back & forth. from left to right slowly. i call my mom who works for the police dept. she called a officer on duty. i drove to the high school which is by my house to get closer to the object. as i enter the parking lot it went south farther away from me. about the same distance from me sitting on the road. i knew at this point it was awear of my presence & interest. i decided to see if it was for sure so i started driving my car back & forth through the parking lot. this light followed my every move. i would stop quickly & it stoped on a dime. i would set for a second then reverse quickly then stop. it was moving exactly as i was. it would hover in one spot when i was setting still. the officer came to the school & seen it himself. hes said it was  a helicopter in stealth mode. but he & i drove towards it he took the big light on his car shining it at the object driving towards it. it was keeping distance from us. when he left being a bit sceptical he said "i dont know what it is". i stayed for a bit longer then decided to go to the store. as i drove away from the school it followed me followed me bout quarter mile. i made my way back towards my house when i turned onto pioneer lane towards the school. i could see it still over the school. i went back to the school & continued seeing if it would copy me & it did.  i was interested in see more of it. i drove to the back on the parking lot where it was really dark nothing around. i turned my car off. at this time it was about 80 yards or so south of me & about 100ft of the ground hovering in one spot. there was no sound at all, it changed it light to a soft white,yellow color not super bright. about the same strenght as the red i would say. i got out of my car turning my engine if & lights. i walked about 30 feet from my car towards it & didnt move. i was scared to go any closer. i stayed back there staring at it for another 10 mins i think. it went slowly south after that. ive seen it one more time about a month ago. also my mother & i seen a day time ufo here about a month ago.  she got a very good look at it. she called me & said look in her direction she was east of me about half mile. she desrcibed is as a boomer-rang making a loud humming sound. i looked i heard the loud humming sound it was very loud. i seen a very very flat object & it looking like it had a configuration of poles on top if it. it was strange & my mother still cant figure it out. i consider myself very rational person & my mother is also. im a facts kinda person i saying without a dout this is what happen. i would like too know if someone could help determine what it was. i stay curious about it & ivve been keeping my eye towards the sky. i could dscribe in better detail i think over the phone.

content.detailedDescription:
Stood on porch around 9:30 or so , saw a brite light low in the eastern sky.
light was not moving, just sitting there. 15 minutes went by and my wife came out and stood next to me. i said , do you see that light? she said yes.
then i asked , is it moving ? she said no . so now i confirmed that what i was seeing was what i was seeing. i said, ok!       a few minutes went by and
it started moving in our direction. i asked again, is that moving to you?
she said, yes!  we just stood there infatuated and captivated at what ever it
was , and coming in our direction ,very very slow! as it got closer all i could think of , what is that!!!! i could not put it in any catagory.It seemed my mind was stuck on , what is that . thats all i could think of.
now it is real close and we both started walking toward the back of our house
slowly all while this thing floated slowly closer and closer toward us.
i kept saying over and over to my wife , what is that? when it got almost above our heads we could not see a shape , all we could see is a bright light
infront and a couple of re lights around the bottom and back. none were blinking and it had to of matched the sky , cause we could not see a shape
at all. and all this 30 feet above our heads. also the craft ,what ever it was made no noise at all ! then as it got maybe 10feet passed us as we were
looking at it, all of a sudden we were looking at eachother in the same spot
but the thing had disapeared . it was like something was missing. we walked back into the house slowly and just kept asking what was that? and her saying
i don't know to my questioning of what was that. the best way i can describe 
it , it was like i was in a dream , but not , and totally dismayed!!!
very blase' , we came in the house sat down and started watching tv. and
clouded asked every once in awhile , what was that? 
                   the more i always thought about it the more strange it gets. it actually had the power to go that slow with no sound and did something to us to make us not know what happened. because we, my wife and i,
can not finish the story. we can not finish the story of then it kept going
and took off in so and so direction or anything. we just can't finish the story. i always kid saying i would like to know if it came in the house and 
raided our fridge or maybe messed with the kids or us., we just don't know!
content.summary: Came out of the east very low , 30 feet over our heads and very slow with no sound, just floated. can't finish story. next we were looking at eachother and walked in house.

content.detailedDescription:
Tuesday, 25 august 2009 10:00 pm est - wednesday 26 august 2009 2:30 am est

description:
at approximately 10:10 pm i noticed an object in the sky, upon first glance it seemed like a star twinkling in the distance.  there was an unusual red / green coloration to the object which attracted my attention enough to retrieve binoculars.  with closer inspection the binoculars revealed that the lights of the object were in a triangular pattern of red / green / amber.  i called my wife to look at the object using another set of binoculars.  she confirmed that there were actually lights in a triangular pattern.  during this time (elapse 15 minutes) the object remained motionless at 302 (nnw) from my original vantage point.   we observed the object jointly for about thirty minutes relocating to a nearby field to obtain a better view.  several aircraft passed close by our position, while the object remained motionless 20 off the visible horizon.  retiring to the house i re-observed the object at fifteen minute intervals, always noting that it was in the same position.  at approximately 1:30 am the object dramatically changed, revealing three solid amber lights and a white strobe light (one second interval).  after observing this for some time i returned to the house.  upon returning for the last look (2:30 am), the object had reverted to its original lighting scheme of red / green / amber.  the object never moved directionally during the entire viewing.



equipment used:
binocular m-17 artillery field glasses 7x50 
jason model 1111 mercury 7x35
content.summary: Unkown lights over central pennsylvania

content.detailedDescription:
My girlfriend and i live in gunnison, co.  we were driving to a new camping spot by lake city, co.  we were going south on hwy 149.  my girlfriend was driving and i was sitting shotgun.  like i said, it was a new capming spot and neither of us have been on this highway before.  

the road was going straight towards a medium sized hill, and then the road turned left of the hill.  just to the right and above the hill is where i saw the ufo.  what made me notice it was that it was shiny.  the sun was just about to set, and the ufo was shinning bright orange from the sun.  i think it had a silver/metallic exterior.  it appeared to be disc/orb shaped.  it was flatter on the bottom and more rounded on the top.  i looked away from it atleast three differnt times, to make sure my eyes weren't playing tricks on me.  i thought it was a cloud, but it most definately was not a cloud.  at that time, there were actually several jets that were flying in the distance. all of them were emitting jet streams and were clearly moving.  this was not moving!  it was hovering above the hill in complete stillness. i wanted to document it with video, but it was somewhat far away.  and i knew you wouldn't be able to see much on video, from the distance we were at.  but, the road turned which made me unable to see the ufo anymore.    

so, we kept driving; hoping that the road would go back around to the other side of the hill; which would have put us closer to the ufo.  but unfortuantely, the road went to the left of the hill, and kept going left, into a canyon.
content.summary: Ufo between gunnison and lake city,co.
